title: U.S. Dollar Declines Further in Cuba Following Announcement of "Official Exchange Market"
description:
The U.S. dollar experienced another dip on Monday in Cuba's unofficial exchange market, now trading at 450 Cuban pesos (CUP), a decrease of 10 pesos from the previous day. This marks the continuation of a downward trend that began on Sunday.

In contrast, the euro (EUR) holds steady at 500 CUP, whil...

title: Dollar and Freely Convertible Currency Value Drops in Cuba
description:
On Thursday, the informal currency market in Cuba opened with notable decreases: the value of both the dollar and the Freely Convertible Currency (MLC) has fallen.

According to the daily report from the independent outlet elTOQUE, which monitors the Informal Market Representative Rate (TRMi), the d...

title: Vietnam-Cuba exemplary, loyal, rare relationship - most valuable asset of two countries: diplomat
description:
Havana (VNA) - The exemplary, loyal and rare relationship stands as the greatest achievement and most valuable asset that Vietnam and Cuba have built over the past 65 years, said Vietnamese Ambassador to Cuba Le Quang Long.



In an interview granted to the Vietnam News Agency (VNA) ahead of the 65t...

title: Why six-decade-long American embargo on Cuba must end now
description:
On October 29, 2025, the UN General Assembly adopted a resolution calling for an end to the United States’ decades-long embargo against Cuba

Cubans call it “El Bloqueo”. Americans call it the “economic blockade”. The world at large sees it as the “siege of Cuba” that has lasted far too long. The ti...
